Title: Relates to aggravated harassment of an employee by an incarcerated individual
Summary: Relates to aggravated harassment of an employee by an incarcerated individual; eliminates the requirement that an incarcerated individual causes or attempts to cause an employee to come into contact with blood, seminal fluid, urine, feces, or the contents of a toilet bowl by throwing, tossing or expelling such fluid or material.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to aggravated harassment of an employee by an incarcerated individual
